item.title: Preprint: NLO gluon fusion to diphoton plus jet cross sections
item.description: In our preprint appearing on arXiv today, Next-to-leading order QCD corrections to diphoton-plus-jet production through gluon fusion at the LHC, we use the two-loop amplitudes from Virtual QCD corrections to gluon-initiated diphoton plus jet production at hadron colliders along with the real corrections to obtain differential cross sections of gluon-initiated diphoton-plus-jet production at NLO.

item.title: Publication: gluon fusion to diphoton plus jets with amplitude neural networks
item.description: Following the preprint release, our paper Optimising simulations for diphoton production at hadron colliders using amplitude neural networks was published by the Journal of High Energy Physics today.

item.title: Preprint: gluon fusion to diphoton plus jets with amplitude neural networks
item.description: Our new paper Optimising simulations for diphoton production at hadron colliders using amplitude neural networks was listed on the arXiv today. I posted about the code for this project yesterday.

item.title: Preprint: gluon fusion to diphoton plus jet at two loops
item.description: Today the preprint of our article Virtual QCD corrections to gluon-initiated diphoton plus jet production at hadron colliders appeared on arXiv, in which we compute the two-loop gluon fusion to diphoton plus jet amplitude, providing it ready for phenomenological application in an accompanying NJet release.

item.title: YTF20 presentation: introduction to precision QCD
